title: A Woman of Love
description: The day before her planned escape, Lady Annabel Peters is forced by her abusive husband to bed James Drake, a man she considers to be a criminal.James, a scarred war hero, has manipulated events so he can interrogate Annabel, a woman he believes to be part of a ring of thieves. Neither of them count on an instant and overwhelming desire.Despite her attraction Annabel knows that James is not to be trusted and yet how can she escape a man who has the ability to control her with a gentle kiss?
author: Marlow Kelly
